skill.name: when-reviewing-pull-request-orchestrate-comprehensive-code-review
skill.description:
Use when conducting comprehensive code review for pull requests across multiple quality dimensions.
Orchestrates 12-15 specialized reviewer agents across 4 phases using star topology coordination.
Covers automated checks, parallel specialized reviews (quality, security, performance, architecture,
documentation), integration analysis, and final merge recommendation in a 4-hour workflow.

skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only SOP workflow definitions and process documentation. No executable code, scripts, or concerning capabilities. All referenced commands (npm, gh, npx claude-flow) are standard development tools used by the user.

content.user_title: Review pull requests with comprehensive multi-agent analysis
content.value_statement: Manual code reviews are slow and inconsistent across reviewers. This skill orchestrates 15 specialized AI agents to validate PRs systematically across security, performance, architecture, and documentation dimensions in a repeatable 4-hour workflow.
actual_capabilities: Orchestrates 15 specialized agents across 4 review phases
Validates code with automated lint, test, and coverage checks
Reviews security vulnerabilities following OWASP Top 10
Analyzes performance impact and architectural consistency
Generates comprehensive merge recommendations with findings
limitations: Requires external tools: GitHub CLI, npm, claude-flow
Execution time is 4 hours for full comprehensive review
Does not modify code automatically - only provides feedback
Specialized reviewers require separate agent definitions

use_cases.title: Enterprise PR validation
use_cases.description: Validate complex PRs requiring review across multiple quality dimensions with systematic agent coordination.

use_cases.title: Security-focused reviews
use_cases.description: Focus on OWASP compliance, vulnerability detection, and secrets scanning in code changes.

use_cases.title: Integration impact analysis
use_cases.description: Assess deployment risk, migration requirements, and backward compatibility before merge.

prompt_templates.title: Basic review request
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the code review orchestration workflow on PR #123 in owner/repo. Focus on security and performance dimensions.

prompt_templates.title: Security-focused review
prompt_templates.prompt: Conduct a comprehensive security review on PR #456. Check for OWASP Top 10 issues, hardcoded secrets, and authentication vulnerabilities.

prompt_templates.title: Performance regression check
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze PR #789 for performance regressions. Focus on algorithmic efficiency, N+1 queries, and resource optimization opportunities.

prompt_templates.title: Full integration review
prompt_templates.prompt: Execute the full 4-phase code review workflow on PR #321. Include automated checks, 10 specialist reviews, integration analysis, and generate final decision with recommendations.

output_examples.input: Review PR #456 with focus on security vulnerabilities
output: Security Findings: 1 HIGH severity issue (SQL injection risk)
Decision: REQUEST CHANGES - Fix blocking security issue before merge

best_practices: Always run automated checks (Phase 1) before specialist reviews to fail fast
Categorize findings by severity to prioritize blocking issues over improvements
Use memory coordination to share findings across specialist reviewers
Generate actionable feedback with specific file locations and fix suggestions
anti_patterns: Skipping automated checks leads to wasted specialist review time
Ignoring high-severity security findings causes production vulnerabilities
Merging without integration testing introduces regressions
Providing vague feedback without file locations frustrates authors

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Claude Code, and Codex through the claude-flow swarm orchestration system.

faq.question: What is the total review time?
faq.answer: Full workflow completes in approximately 4 hours across 4 phases with parallel agent execution.

faq.question: How many agents participate in review?
faq.answer: Up to 15 specialized agents coordinate in star topology - 4 automated + 10 specialist + 1 PR manager.

faq.question: Does this skill modify code automatically?
faq.answer: No, this skill only analyzes code and provides feedback. It does not write fixes or commit changes.

faq.question: What external tools are required?
faq.answer: Requires GitHub CLI (gh), npm/node, and claude-flow package for orchestration and memory coordination.

faq.question: How does this compare to standard code review?
faq.answer: Provides consistent multi-dimensional analysis across all PRs with specialized expertise that varies by reviewer.
